gobblin.metrics

Class GobblinMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.GobblinMetrics

  • public class GobblinMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a set of metrics associated with a given name.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • addCustomTagToState

        public static void addCustomTagToState(gobblin.configuration.State state,
                                       gobblin.metrics.Tag<?> tag)
        Add a Tag to a State with key METRICS_STATE_CUSTOM_TAGS.

        Tags under this key can later be parsed using the method getCustomTagsFromState(gobblin.configuration.State).

        Parameters:
        state - State state to add the tag to.
        tag - Tag to add.

      • addCustomTagsToProperties

        public static void addCustomTagsToProperties(java.util.Properties properties,
                                             java.util.List<gobblin.metrics.Tag<?>> tags)
        Add List of Tags to a Properties with key METRICS_STATE_CUSTOM_TAGS.

        Also see addCustomTagToState(State, Tag) , addCustomTagToProperties(Properties, Tag)

        The Properties passed can be used to build a State. Tags under this key can later be parsed using the method getCustomTagsFromState(gobblin.configuration.State).

        Parameters:
        properties - Properties to add the tag to.
        tags - list of Tags to add.

      • addCustomTagToProperties

        public static void addCustomTagToProperties(java.util.Properties properties,
                                            gobblin.metrics.Tag<?> tag)
        Add a Tag to a Properties with key METRICS_STATE_CUSTOM_TAGS. Also see addCustomTagToState(State, Tag)

        The Properties passed can be used to build a State. Tags under this key can later be parsed using the method getCustomTagsFromState(gobblin.configuration.State).

        Parameters:
        properties - Properties to add the tag to.
        tag - Tag to add.

      • getCustomTagsFromState

        public static java.util.List<gobblin.metrics.Tag<?>> getCustomTagsFromState(gobblin.configuration.State state)
        Parse custom Tags from property METRICS_STATE_CUSTOM_TAGS in the input State.
        Parameters:
        state - State possibly containing custom tags.
        Returns:
        List of Tag parsed from input.
